vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Χουζᾶς, -ᾶ, ὁ
Chuzas (EV, Chuza): Luk.8:3.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Luk.8.3; married to Joanna (G2489)
§ Cuza
Cuza, "little judge"
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
苦撒 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "預言者"
希律安提帕的家宰 (路 8:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
苦撒 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "预言者"
希律安提帕的家宰 (路 8:3)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Chu-xa, quan quản lý của Hê-rốt.
